location.physicalLocation: British Library: India Office Records and Private Papers

titleInfo.title: 'MAP 37 TO ILLUSTRATE OPERATIONS ON THE EUPHRATES LINE. March, 1918.'

physicalDescription.extent: Materials: Printed on paperDimensions: 170 x 170mm, on sheet 208 x 330mm

mods.abstract: The map accompanies The Campaign in Mesopotamia 1914-1918. Volume IV, and shows a stretch of the River Euphrates in central Iraq, indicating towns, settlements, routes and railways. Rivers are printed in blue.Prepared in the Historical Section of the Committee of Imperial Defence, and printed at the Ordnance Survey in 1927.
